languages.text: "Никто не бессмертен, сенешаль. Неумирающий прошепчет имя каждого".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Abelard: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."

languages.text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."
languages.original_text: "Никто не бессмертен, сенешаль. Неумирающий прошепчет имя каждого".

traits.locale_text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."
"No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."
"No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."
"No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."
"No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."

languages.text: "Niemand ist unsterblich, Truchsess. Letzten Endes flüstert der Todlose den Namen eines jeden."
languages.original_text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."

traits.locale_text: "Niemand ist unsterblich, Truchsess. Letzten Endes flüstert der Todlose den Namen eines jeden."

languages.text: « Personne n'est éternel, sénéchal. Tôt ou tard, l'Immortel finit par prononcer le nom de chacun. »
languages.original_text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."

traits.locale_text: « Personne n'est éternel, sénéchal. Tôt ou tard, l'Immortel finit par prononcer le nom de chacun. »

languages.text: «Nadie es eterno, Senescal. El Inmortal susurra el nombre de todos, tarde o temprano».
languages.original_text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."

traits.locale_text: «Nadie es eterno, Senescal. El Inmortal susurra el nombre de todos, tarde o temprano».

languages.text: 「不死身の者などいない。家令長。不死の者は最後には、皆の名前を囁く」
languages.original_text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."

traits.locale_text: 「不死身の者などいない。家令長。不死の者は最後には、皆の名前を囁く」

languages.text: “没有人永生不死，总领。不死之神终究会低声道出每个人的名字。”
languages.original_text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."

traits.locale_text: “没有人永生不死，总领。不死之神终究会低声道出每个人的名字。”

languages.original_text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."

languages.text: "Kimse ölümsüz değildir Seneşal. Ölmeyen, en nihayetinde herkesin ismini fısıldar."
languages.original_text: "No one is immortal, Seneschal. The Undying One whispers everyone's name in the end."
